data.name: Hit & Run
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

In this Lovecraft-Inspired short, Katie (Adriene Mishler) takes her brother John (Brock England) to the site of an accident he's just had in his car. The only thing they find there is a strange amulet. When she tries to call John the next day, his number has been disconnected. But when she investigates his disappearance, her life takes a turn for the worse. Much worse. Maybe when you hit someone with your car in the middle of the night in the middle of nowhere, it's best to call an ambulance.

Directed by: Jason Neulander
Produced by: Christopher Shea, Jason Neulander
Starring: Adriene Mishler, Brock England, Jessie Douglas, Victor Steele
data.about_the_game:
In this Lovecraft-Inspired short, Katie (Adriene Mishler) takes her brother John (Brock England) to the site of an accident he's just had in his car. The only thing they find there is a strange amulet. When she tries to call John the next day, his number has been disconnected. But when she investigates his disappearance, her life takes a turn for the worse. Much worse. Maybe when you hit someone with your car in the middle of the night in the middle of nowhere, it's best to call an ambulance.

Directed by: Jason Neulander
Produced by: Christopher Shea, Jason Neulander
Starring: Adriene Mishler, Brock England, Jessie Douglas, Victor Steele
data.short_description: In this Lovecraft-inspired short, Katie's brother John thinks he's run over someone. What they find instead will change their lives forever. And not for the better.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
